attributes.action: Rebuild the outdoor pool in Maidenhead
attributes.background: Every year in the hot weather we have youngsters drowning in the river. Let’s rebuild the open air pool on the old site (which is currently a car park) to give the youngsters somewhere safe to swim.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Maintenance of local swimming pools are a matter for the owner or relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
